posts.post_title: WANTED!  ISO T209-2 Titman and Wallace (Richmond)
posts.post_content:
In search of two Richmond players to complete my team set.  I’m in search of Guy Titman and Arthur Wallace.

Many thanks.

Brian
Any chance anyone has these or knows of any, as unlikely as it is?
